Today, the East Coast is lighting up at Aberdeen Harbour with a fun 3 ft @9s NE swell and light 8 mph NW winds, best during the mid-day push from 08:48 to 15:33. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 2 ft @10s NNE with fresh 17 mph WNW winds, making it a bit choppy but still surfable. On January 1st, conditions worsen as the swell drops to 3 ft @5s NW with stronger 22 mph NW winds, leading to blown-out surf. Best: today.
